e: ￹`Ma~`tefoc~ `no~ `Kawas~ `kako~.￺I have been punished by God.￻我被上帝懲罰
￹`O~ `maan~ `ko~ `sapa~`tefoc~ `to~ `raraw~ `iso~?￺What is the penalty payment for your sin?￻用什麼來替代你的罪？
￹`sapa~`tefoc~ `to~ `raraw~ `ita~ `ci~`~ `Yis~.￺Jesus became the ransom for our sins.￻耶穌變成我們罪的贖金
￹`O~ `tatefocen~ `ko~ `raraw~ `nira~.￺His sins must be punished.￻他的罪是該受罰的
